title: Dill, tomato and beetroot salad
ingredients: ['6 tablespoons olive oil', '2 tablespoons walnut oil', '2 tablespoons red wine vinegar', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', 'small handful minced fresh dill', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '2 tomatoes, diced', '1 stalk celery, chopped', '1 spring onion, chopped', '450g (1 lb) beetroot, cooked and chopped']
